name: God! What does the Queen want?
name_original: God! What does the Queen want?
description:
You are just a humble pawn, who fell in love with the Queen, but... Her Majesty has her preference. There are many rumors of who's dating who. Does the King prefer the Knight? Or is the Rook deeply in love with the Bishop? But most importantly,
What Does the Queen Want?!

Be careful: some will tell you the truth and others will lie to you!
Try to figure out what kind of piece you have to become and reach the end of the chessboard to achieve your love story with the Queen!


This game was made for the ScribbleJam on Itch.io!
